ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when Shu'ayb said to them, 'Will you not have taqwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When Shu'aib said to them: "Will you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall, when Shuayb said to them: "Have you no fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Shu'ayb asked them, "Why do you not have fear of God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When Shuaib said to all of them, “Do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When Shu`ayb said to them: "Will you not have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When Shu'aib said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when Shuaib said to them, 'Will you not be godfearing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When Shu'eyb said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: What time Shu'aib, said unto them: fear ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when Shu‘ayb said to them, ‘Will you not be wary [of Allah]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, Shu'aib said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When Shu'aib (Shuaib) said to them: "Will you not fear Allah (and obey Him)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Shu'aib said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When Shuaib said to them, “Do you not fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:177] when Shu‘ayb — He [God] does not say ‘their brother’ [in this instance] because he [Shu‘ayb] was not [in terms of lineage] one of them — said to them, ‘Will you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When Shu'ayb said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)) will you not ward off the worship of other than Allah?
